meta.title: Image Pro - Professional Online Image Editor
meta.description: Secure, fast, and private online image editor. Crop, rotate, and resize images directly in your browser without uploading to any server.
meta.keywords: image editor, crop image, resize image, image compression, batch image processing, format converter, online photo editor, privacy first, client-side editor

hero.description: Experience the power of secure, client-side image processing. No uploads needed—your photos never leave your device.

templates.description: Everything you need to perfect your images, built for speed and privacy.
templates.item_1_desc: Intelligent aspect ratio locking and centered cropping for perfect compositions.
templates.item_2_desc: Fine-tune alignment with grid overlays and smooth 360-degree rotation.
templates.item_3_desc: Resize your images while maintaining high quality and sharp details.

privacy.description: We believe in privacy by design. Image Pro processes all your photos locally in your browser using advanced WebAssembly and Canvas technologies.
privacy.item_1_desc: Files remain on your device. Zero risk of data leaks.
privacy.item_2_desc: Works without internet once loaded. Fast and reliable.

devices.title: Works Everywhere
devices.subtitle: Optimized for all your devices
devices.laptop_desc: Full keyboard shortcuts and precision control.

footer.title: Ready to Create?
footer.description: Join thousands of users who trust Image Pro for their daily image editing tasks.
